div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-11
CodeDisplay
XM2WV4Meningococcal vaccines
XM5LC2Meningococcal polyvalent purified polysaccharides antigen
XM3T39Meningococcus A, C, bivalent purified polysaccharides antigen
XM5XP9Diphtheria, hemophilus influenzae B, pertussis, tetanus-hepatitis B, meningococcus A + C vaccine
XM2AR0Meningococcus A, C, Y, W-135, tetravalent purified polysaccharides antigen
XM2EH7Meningococcus A, C, Y, W-135, tetravalent purified polysaccharides antigen conjugated

Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
871871008Vaccine product containing only Neisseria meningitidis serogroup A and C antigens (medicinal product)
871873006Vaccine product containing only Neisseria meningitidis serogroup A, C, W135 and Y antigens (medicinal product)
871916006Vaccine product containing only Neisseria meningitidis serogroup A, C, W135 and Y capsular oligosaccharide conjugated antigens (medicinal product)
1971000221105Vaccine product containing only Neisseria meningitidis serogroup A, C, W135 and Y capsular polysaccharide conjugated antigens (medicinal product)
